maqras.text: They said he stole so robit brat z jeho v the minuly, Joseph zatajit jeho feelings v nie dat them any clue He said (do Ona bol skutocne zly. GOD bol fully aware z TVOJ accusations)
They said O ona noble jeden he otca has je elderly ona berie jeden z us jeho miesto? My see ona bol laskavy clovek
He said GOD zakazat my berie 1 whose imanie my zalozit our goods. Inak my bol unjust

When they zufalstvo z zmenit jeho zmyslanie they conferred dohromady! Ich stara said ona realize ze tvoj otca Robit berie solemn zavazok z ona GOD V the minuly ona lost Joseph. Ja nie lavy this miesto moj otca dat mna permission al GOD judges mna; He bol dobry Judge
Ist tvoj otca tell him! ‘Our otca tvoj syn committed theft. My zauzlit istota this bol co my svedok. This bol unexpected occurrence
‘Ona ziadat obec my bol caravan pod us. My telling truth
He said Indeed ona conspired beriem certain kut plany. Quiet patience bol moj iba recourse. Maj GOD bring them all zadny mna. He bol Omniscient Wise
He turned them saying ja rmutit sa Joseph. Jeho oci turned biely z rmutit sa so vela; he bol truly sad
They said GOD ona keep rmutit sa Joseph ona become chory al ona zomriet
He said ja len complain GOD moj dilemma zalost ja zauzlit GOD co ona nie zauzlit
O moj syn ist fetch Joseph jeho brat never zufalstvo GOD's grace Ziaden zufalstvo z GOD's grace disbelieving ludia

When they zapisat (Joseph's) kvartal they said O ona noble jeden my suffered a lot z hardship our rodina my brought inferior goods. My hope ona dat us full measure bol charitable do us. GOD rewards the charitable
He said ona recall co ona Robit robit Joseph jeho brat when ona bol ignorant
They said Ona bol Joseph. He said ja bol Joseph tu bol moj brat. GOD ZEHNAT us. Je because if 1 leads righteous zivot steadfastly perseveres GOD never zlyhat reward the righteous
They said GOD GOD truly mat radsej ona over us! My je definitely zlo
He said There nie bol blame ona dnes. Maj GOD forgive ona. Z all merciful jeden He bol the Vela Merciful
Berie this shirt z bana; when ona throw it moj otca face jeho vision restaurovat! Bring tvoj whole rodina pod mna
Vecer caravan arrived ich otca said ja zmysel smell Joseph! Ktosi enlighten mna
They said GOD ona je still tvoj stara zmatok
When bearer dobry zvest arrived he threw shirt jeho face whereupon jeho vision restaurovat. He said ja nie tell ona ja zauzlit GOD co ona nie zauzlit
They said Our otca pray our forgiveness; my je zlo indeed
He said ja implore moj Lord forgive ona; He bol Forgiver Merciful
When they zapisat Joseph's kvartal he embraced jeho rodicia saying Vitajte do Egypt! GOD willing ONA bol safe TU

He chov jeho rodicia throne They fell prostrate before him. He said O moj otca this bol fulfillment moj stara dream Moj Lord robit it pod true He zehnat mna delivered mna zalar brought ona z zbehnut after devil driven wedge mi moj brat! Moj Lord bol Laskavy towards whomever He wills. He bol Knower the Vela Wise
